Package serverSide.sharedRegions

Class KitchenInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • serverSide.sharedRegions.KitchenInterface
  • public class KitchenInterface
extends Object
    Interface to the Kitchen. It is responsible to validate and process the incoming message, execute the corresponding method on the Kitchen and generate the outgoing message. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.
